ready-leaf-exec.title: Leaf-only readiness for execution
ready-leaf-exec.description: Ensure execution readiness only includes leaf tasks and never dispatches parent/container tasks.
acceptanceCriteria: ReadyTasks never returns items with non-empty childIds.
CLI execute and TUI execute only act on leaf tasks.
Ready counts in UI reflect only executable leaves.
ready-leaf-exec.prompt: Implement leaf-only readiness for execution and update tests per specs/bugs/READY_LEAF_ONLY.md.

ready-leaf-exec-logic.title: Exclude non-leaf tasks in ReadyTasks
ready-leaf-exec-logic.description: Update internal/execution/selector.go ReadyTasks to skip items with childIds and clarify comments.
acceptanceCriteria: ReadyTasks checks len(childIds)==0 before returning readiness.
Comment/doc in selector.go reflects leaf-only readiness.
ready-leaf-exec-logic.prompt: Modify ReadyTasks in internal/execution/selector.go to skip items where len(childIds)>0 and update related comments.

ready-leaf-exec-tests.title: Add/adjust ReadyTasks tests for leaf-only behavior
ready-leaf-exec-tests.description: Ensure test coverage that non-leaf tasks are excluded and leaf tasks still return when deps satisfied.
acceptanceCriteria: Tests cover that a todo task with childIds is not ready.
Tests cover that a leaf todo task with deps satisfied is ready.
Existing ReadyTasks tests updated as needed.
